subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] I'm BAAAAAACK
author: Amy Swanson
full_text:
--0-800666901-1152316543=:93464
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

yall should get into that conversation sometime, has she ever gotten involved in your work? Have you tried to involve her? Maybe she feels scared or put off, or not wanted <involving> hell if i know lol
  how about taking her on a "hunt". See how she respioinds to that.
  Since i have been delving into this more, i am less scared of death, still scared ofcourse but less. I tell my husband not to worry that ill stick around, ill be back. That gives me alot of comfort actually, that i dont HAVE to leave.
  oooh yeah almost forgot, do you think the heartattack warnings were NOT for YOU?
  maybe relistening to that evp might clarify?
  amy

Sumption Frank <fsumption@...> wrote:
               I think they did try to warn us, I found voices about the heart attack on the June 5th tape, but I didn�t hear it the first time through. maybe it�s hard to make out the voices until after the fact. My wife has that usual fear do death that most seem to have in this society, and I think doctors tend to intensify it. She claims to believe in an afterlife, but I don�t know how much of that she�s saying to humor me. 
  
      
---------------------------------
  
  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Amy Swanson
Sent: Friday, July 07, 2006 12:52 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] I'm BAAAAAACK

  
          ok, so does she believe in the after life? That you do exist after your body dies? What kind of fear state? 

    It is quite possible that you could of been getting messages about her heartattack. That you werent clear on what the messages ment. Therefore IF that WERE the case , doesnt it then make you re-evaluate your information? <that your receiveing>?

    Have you asked them if they knew it was going to happen? Did they try to warn you? 

    How about that one evp ..something to the effect of it effecting your nervous system doing the evp's? IF thats related, isnt that a poltegeist thats causing harm ?, and the others trying to warn you about "him"? A spirit guide i remember you mentioning telling you NOT to record any more? MAYBE you NEED to "get rid" of some of the spirits that are around you? Tuning into your spirit guide? and getting protection? maybe a clensing or the like?  just a few thoughts to ponder eh?

    

    

    amy

Sumption Frank <fsumption@...> wrote:

            Well, the wife seems ok now. The doctors had her in a fear state, but she won�t mention it to me because of my interests.  Maybe some of those June warning were for my wife, but I mis-understood them?

     Frank

      
---------------------------------
  
    From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Amy Swanson
Sent: Friday, July 07, 2006 11:21 AM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] I'm BAAAAAACK


            So, i see that your wife had a heartattack? I'm sorry! I hope that she is doibng well and has a full recovery. 


      Did you think you had warning abnout this?


      How is she handeling all of this? I see something abnout fear of death? abnd doctors?


      amy

Sumption Frank <fsumption@...> wrote:


               Welcome back Amy, I was beginning to wonder if you left the group!!   I have that problem with computers I use for EVP, they seem to byte the dust on a regular basis. I just got a laptop that I loaded with EVPmaker and audio software so I can work on EVP while in Grand Junction next week. All my computers are scavenged junkers. 


       Frank


      
---------------------------------
  
      From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Amy Swanson
Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2006 8:17 PM
To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com; Haunted_Times_Magazine_Public_group@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EVP-ITC] I'm BAAAAAACK



              WELL, 



        I AM GLAD TO BE BACK! 



        I finally got back from minnesota, and my comp was crashed! 



        Never fails!



        Its halfassed fixed.............lol



        OOOHHHH yeah i have 242 UNREAD emails! LOL



        That should take me a few hours to read!



        ILL get back to everyone who emailed asap!!



        Amy









    




      http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/
